entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers except flurries over northwestern sections overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 40 over exposed coastal sections. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers ending late in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 20 km/h except 40 over exposed coastal sections. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
